title: [SOLVED]820-00165 no power i can't get this shit to work need some help please.
message: Hi guys working on an 820-00165 air board, as we all know all rails are present green light on charger. Only rail i'm not sure about is PP5V S4RS3 which has 0v i tested for shorts on s0 rails and all are fine. What else could i check to solve this issue ?

title: [SOLVED]820-00165 no power i can't get this shit to work need some help please.
message:
PP5V_S4RS3 is being generated by the U7501 circuit, but only if P5VS4RS3_EN is high. P5VS4RS3_EN comes from PM_SLP_S4_L/S4_PWR_EN.

Voltages of PM_SLP_S4_L, S5_PWRGD, PM_DSW_PWRGD?

title: [SOLVED]820-00165 no power i can't get this shit to work need some help please.
message:
[QUOTE="smiba, post: 26728"]PP5V_S4RS3 is being generated by the U7501 circuit, but only if P5VS4RS3_EN is high. P5VS4RS3_EN comes from PM_SLP_S4_L/S4_PWR_EN.

Voltages of PM_SLP_S4_L, S5_PWRGD, PM_DSW_PWRGD?[/QUOTE]

Here is what i got simba thanks for your assistance PM_SLP_S4_L 0V S5_PWRGD 3.395 PM_DSW_PWRGD 3.423

title: [SOLVED]820-00165 no power i can't get this shit to work need some help please.
message: If you check pin 2 on U7501 is it 0v steady or 0v for 3 seconds then up to 1-3v later and back down?

title: [SOLVED]820-00165 no power i can't get this shit to work need some help please.
message: As Louis asked, is the 5V bus pulsing? Was the liquid damage? PPVRTC present?

title: [SOLVED]820-00165 no power i can't get this shit to work need some help please.
message:
[QUOTE="larossmann, post: 26738"]If you check pin 2 on U7501 is it 0v steady or 0v for 3 seconds then up to 1-3v later and back down?[/QUOTE]
whats good big bro yes pin is steady 0v not pulsing

title: [SOLVED]820-00165 no power i can't get this shit to work need some help please.
message:
[QUOTE="dukefawks, post: 26747"]As Louis asked, is the 5V bus pulsing? Was the liquid damage? PPVRTC present?[/QUOTE]

Hey Duke 5v bus is steady no liquid damage clean as a Whistle PPVRTC is 0v charger plugged in. Is that normal in an s5 state?

title: [SOLVED]820-00165 no power i can't get this shit to work need some help please.
message: PPVRTC must be present. Check for short to GND then check U1900 for corrosion.

title: [SOLVED]820-00165 no power i can't get this shit to work need some help please.
message: Ok guys mark this one as solved, i was fucking trolled by the charger here is why. So i was using a magesafe 1 charger with the magsafe 2 adapter piece apple sells for some reason on the 2015 boards this causes a glitch where the logic board won't turn on, this has has happened to me on a same identical board in the past and i could not figure out why. I used my magsafe 2 from my retina mac and bam it was turned on like a fuking hore, i was pissed all that time wasted for a freaking charger issue i have learned my lesson "USE THE RIGHT CHARGER TO TEST YOUR LOGIC BOARDS".
